SELECT pib.id, pib.Uid, p.name AS productName, pib.title, pib.isLocked, pib.regDate, pib.updateDate, COUNT(pibc.id) AS commentCount FROM product_inquiry_board pib JOIN product p ON pib.Pid = p.id LEFT JOIN product_inquiry_board_comment pibc ON pib.id = pibc.P_Board_Id
AND pib.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY pib.id
HAVING commentCount < 1
ORDER BY pib.updateDate DESC, pib.regDate DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{criteria.amount}
